description:
No menu options function, can't open preferences menu (needed to set account details to log in, etc.). Entirely non-functional.

The app on Zotero.org is 1 major version ahead and functional.
As per Richard M Crowley - completely non-functioning. Looks OK but no menu functionality and no way to log in to Zotero account.

This is such a great app for organizing journal papers and Pubmed searches. The ability to annotate articles from within Zotero and then extract those annotations is really great. 

Highly recommend this wonderful app. Many thanks to the creators.

The app itself is great - I have been using the desktop version directly from the Zotero website for some time now. However, the flatpak is not useful for me. The folder where I keep my research papers is in a different partition and it's not easy to figure out how to access that from the flatpak version. (I don't yet use Zotero's file sync.) It seems to be creating its own virtual file system. I'll probably need to study up about flatpak to use this correctly.

I wish there was a way to use personal cloud, or even Google Drive. Perhaps the storage built in is to subsidize the product?

Personally, I'd prefer the donation route, to get that feature as a 'Pro' option maybe via Patreon or? Just a suggestion ...
summary: I'm Happy With It - Have Suggestion Tho

description: Don't know how people write academically without it!
I can't cite anything I tried to add it to Write in LibreOffice and I don't have that option.
cannot change pdf-viewer, it refers to sanbox file system that does not include e.g. okular.... so it makes package unusable...
I a delighted with how great Zoter is for organizing and syncing my research library across my devices. It works great for me!

This Software is simply amazing! It allos to simply enter ISBNs and downloads Metadata to a publication without any fuzz.
Afterwards it can be exported into the typical biblatex format.
It became a substantial part of my Latex-Workflow. Total recommendation!
summary: Amazing Software, prefect for biblatex referencing

description: Extremely helpful in multiple thesis and essays
summary: Extremely helpful in multiple thesis and essays

description: After it took me some time to set everything up and get used to Zotero became quickly one of the applications I use most. Massive time-saver, but automating my Citations also reduces the amount of small mistakes I would make doing everything myself.
summary: One of my most essential applications

description: Zotero te permite organizar cantidades enormes de información documental. Puedes agregar registros de libros, artículos, videos, entrevistas, páginas web, etc. y agregar notas, archivos adjuntos, etiquetas, así como conectarlo con Firefox u otro navegador y con tu procesador de textos favorito para facilitar la creación de bibliografías.
It is an essential app to manage a bibliography. It works great.
Công cụ cần có cho học tập và nghiên cứu.

Intégré à Writer, Zotero est très utile.
Simple, rapide... Que dire de plus ?
Impératif si vous suivez un cursus universitaire.
При написании работ, где в итоге потребуется составлять библиографический список - суперприложение! Есть связка с браузером и либре офисом.
